mapper.select: select ID, ORDERID, GROUPID, PRODUCTID, PURCHASENUM, PURCHASEPRICE, PURCHASETOTAL, PURCHASEPRICELAST, RECOMMENDNUM, ARRIVENUM, STOCKNUM, DAMAGENUM, OVERNUM, STATUS, CONTENT, CREATEOPER, CREATETIME, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, OPER, OPERTIME from DB_PURCHASE_ITEM where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
